text: Joseph Harold Grady (February 27, 1917 – January 9, 2002) was a judge and the mayor of Baltimore, Maryland from 1959 to 1962. Prior to running for mayor, he was an FBI agent and state's attorney for Baltimore city.MARYLAND: Harold Be Humble - TIME == External links == * == References == *http://politicalgraveyard.com/bio/grady.html#RNX02YEZ2 *http://www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,869039,00.html Category:1917 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Politicians from Williamsport, Pennsylvania Category:Maryland Democrats Category:Maryland state court judges Category:Mayors of Baltimore Category:Federal Bureau of Investigation agents Category:State's attorneys in Maryland Category:20th-century American judges
title: J. Harold Grady
